content.question:
<math alttext="H O C N, aqueous, is in equilibrium with H with a positive 1 charge, aqueous, plus O C N with a negative 1 charge, aqueous. K sub a, equals 3 times 10 to the negative 4 power." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>HOCN</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>⇄</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mtext>H</mtext><mo>+</mo></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>+</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="4.0em"></mspace><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></math>
The ionization of cyanic acid, <math alttext="H O C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>HOCN</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, is represented above. A certain solution of <math alttext="H O C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>HOCN</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has a <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="2.0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the approximate concentration of unionized <math alttext="H O C N, aqueous" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>HOCN</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> in the solution?

choices.label: <math alttext="3 times 10 to the negative 4 power, molar" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1 times 10 to the negative 2 power, molar" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times 10 to the negative 1 power, molar" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times 10 to the 0 power, molar" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3 times 10 to the negative 1 power, molar" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
